member.name: D3D11_KEY_EXCHANGE_HW_PROTECTION_DATA
member.summary: Represents key exchange data for hardware content protection.

member.name: D3D11_KEY_EXCHANGE_HW_PROTECTION_DATA.HWProtectionFunctionID
member.summary: The function ID of the DRM command. The values and meanings of the function ID are defined by the DRM specification.

member.name: D3D11_KEY_EXCHANGE_HW_PROTECTION_DATA.pInputData
member.summary: Pointer to a buffer containing a structure that specifies memory reserved for IHV use and the input data for the DRM command.

member.name: D3D11_KEY_EXCHANGE_HW_PROTECTION_DATA.pOutputData
member.summary: Pointer to a buffer containing a structure that specifies memory reserved for IHV use and the input data for the DRM command.

member.name: D3D11_KEY_EXCHANGE_HW_PROTECTION_DATA.Status
member.summary: The result of the hardware DRM command.
